title: Exclusive Unplugged Session: Matthew P
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Matthew-P-Now1.jpg "Matthew-P-Now")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7572-exclusive-unplugged-session-matthew-p/attachment/matthew-p-now-2)

It feels like an age ago that I first waded into the territory of recording ‘sessions’ with bands and artists, with **Dog is Dead** so kindly offering their immense musical talent to us for couple of tracks, one of which was never recorded as a session before.  Well I’m excited to let you know about the extended unplugged session I recorded with the fantastic singer/songwriter **Matthew P** at the wonderful **Trof Cafe** in Manchester. Having already featured on **Crack In The Road**, **Matthew P**, through **Fiction Records**, is currently in the process of releasing a series of free tracks which will make up his debut EP. We were fortunate enough to catch up with **Matt** before he headed off to a gig in Liverpool, and below you can witness the fruits of our labour. Enjoy!

**The Breakfast Song:**

**Rolling On:**

**Gilly:**

**Patty:**
